name: LIT Project One: Survive All Apocalypses

metadata.name: Survive All Apocalypses #1
metadata.description:
Survive All Apocalypses by Neil Strauss is the first major decentralized book minted to the Ethereum blockchain. Read this book directly from your OpenSea account by tapping on the right side of the page to turn it forward or tapping on the left side to flip it back on mobile. Click on desktop. 892 editions only. The first in a series of exclusive experiences for $LIT holders.

Smart contract by Transient Labs.

[View Fullscreen](https://litwtf.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmRC1D6fPfdvy92cXTBnNa9ersKErPRhPS5HnLVSxncBR8/1.html)
